content.value:
Daughter and I just had a few games of Fortnite together - we trash talk and laugh at how silly I am.

I don’t get along with my dad, I don’t celebrate Father’s Day for me or him - just another day.

But we gamed and laughed. I know how lucky I am to be her dad all the time.
content.html: Daughter and I just had a few games of Fortnite together - we trash talk and laugh at how silly I am. I don’t get along with my dad, I don’t celebrate Father’s Day for me or him - just another day. But we gamed and laughed. I know how lucky I am to be her dad all the time.
